root.Summary: 1: Chen M, Zhu N, Liu X, Laurent B, Tang Z, Eng R, Shi Y, Armstrong SA, RoederRG. JMJD1C is required for the survival of acute myeloid leukemia by functioning as a coactivator for key transcription factors. Genes Dev. 2015 Oct15;29(20):2123-39. doi: 10.1101/gad.267278.115.
